#How to setup the Djapian into your project

Before continue reading, make sure that you already have `djapian` installed (InstallingDjapian)

= Introduction =

To setup the Djapian into your project follow this steps

 * Add `djapian` into your `INSTALLED_APPS`
 * Run `python manage.py syncdb`

That's it :)

Now you need setup your models, that is here: SettingUpModels
